name: EZMath
description:
***GAME STILL IN DEVELOPMENT***

This game is made to take the competitive side of hyper-casual games, and let it help you memorize the simple parts of mathematics (like the multiplication board).

The game is still in development and should receive a mobile update, more levels, Leaderboards, And most importantly better feedback on the current level.

Most assets were made by me and can be asked to use if needed. (The low poly trees are in the asset store)

For any ideas, bugs, etc feel free to contact me.
